about.title: About Capoeira Tucum
about.text: Capoeira is a Brazilian martial art disguised as a dance and performed to musical instruments and traditional Brazilian songs. It is comprised of specific offensive and defensive movements and, unlike in other martial arts, the participant is constantly in motion because of the basic movement, the ginga.

classes.title: Sign Up For A Free Trial Class
classes.text: We want to make sure that you love your classes and therefore offer you an opportunity to try to out for free! Besides that, we always have different promotions and discounts. We confidently stand behind the slogan that capoeira should and must be available for everyone!

contact.title: Get To Know Us
contact.text: Everything you should know about how to get to our school as well as what to wear on your first training.
